page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Baked Beans}There is one person on 'it'.On the command 'broadbeans' you make a star shape,'runnerbeans' you walk,'jumping beans' you jump, 'dwarf beans' you curl up and 'baked beans' you run to avoid being caught. {Stuck_in_the_mud.}One person is on 'it' chasing you.If you are caught you stand with your legs apart until somebody crawls through them to free you. {Red Letter.}One person stands about 5 steps away from the line of others.She calls out 'My Red letter is ...' choosing any letter of the alphabet. If the letter is in your name then you take one step forward, or two if it is the first letter of your name.At the letter 'e' no_one must move,if they do they go back to the beginning.
